HYEHYEON MOON

Frontend Developer · LINE NEXT · angelfox4@naver.com

As a frontend developer with three years of experience, I prioritize delivering optimized web services for users. I have been involved in the entire process of launching and operating a web platform with over five million users. Additionally, I pursue a proactive development approach through communication rather than passive development. Recently, I have been interested in building and operating user behavior data pipelines and am studying data engineering.
